mapper.update:
update tbl_contacts
owner = #{owner,jdbcType=CHAR},
source = #{source,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
customer_id = #{customerId,jdbcType=CHAR},
fullname = #{fullname,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
appellation = #{appellation,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
email = #{email,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
mphone = #{mphone,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
job = #{job,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
create_by = #{createBy,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
create_time = #{createTime,jdbcType=CHAR},
edit_by = #{editBy,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
edit_time = #{editTime,jdbcType=CHAR},
description = #{description,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
contact_summary = #{contactSummary,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
next_contact_time = #{nextContactTime,jdbcType=CHAR},
address = #{address,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
where id = #{id,jdbcType=CHAR}

update tbl_contacts set owner = #{owner,jdbcType=CHAR}, source = #{source,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, customer_id = #{customerId,jdbcType=CHAR}, fullname = #{fullname,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, appellation = #{appellation,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, email = #{email,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, mphone = #{mphone,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, job = #{job,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, create_by = #{createBy,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, create_time = #{createTime,jdbcType=CHAR}, edit_by = #{editBy,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, edit_time = #{editTime,jdbcType=CHAR}, description = #{description,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, contact_summary = #{contactSummary,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, next_contact_time = #{nextContactTime,jdbcType=CHAR}, address = #{address,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where id = #{id,jdbcType=CHAR}
mapper.insert: insert into tbl_contacts( id, owner, source, customer_id, fullname, appellation, email, mphone, job, create_by,create_time,description, contact_summary, next_contact_time,address,birth) values (#{id},#{ owner},#{ source},#{ customerId},#{ fullname},#{ appellation},#{ email},#{ mphone},#{ job},#{ createBy},#{createTime},#{description},#{contactSummary},#{ nextContactTime},#{address},#{birth})
mapper.select: select id,fullname,email,mphone from tbl_contacts where customer_id = #{customerId}

select cs.id,cs.fullname,cr.name as customer_id,u.name as owner,dv.value as source,cs.birth from tbl_contacts cs left join tbl_customer cr on cs.customer_id=cr.id join tbl_user u on cs.owner=u.id left join tbl_dic_value dv on cs.source=dv.id
u.name like '%' #{owner} '%'
and cs.fullname like '%' #{fullname} '%'
and cr.name like '%' #{customerName} '%'
and dv.value = #{source}
and cs.birth like '%' #{birth} '%'
order by cs.create_time desc limit #{pageNo},#{pageSize}

select count(*) from tbl_contacts cs left join tbl_customer cr on cs.customer_id=cr.id join tbl_user u on cs.owner=u.id left join tbl_dic_value dv on cs.source=dv.id
u.name like '%' #{owner} '%'
and cs.fullname like '%' #{fullname} '%'
and cr.name like '%' #{customerName} '%'
and dv.value = #{source}
and cs.birth like '%' #{birth} '%'

select cs.id, u1.name as owner, dv1.value as source, co1.name as customer_id, cs.fullname, dv2.value as appellation, cs.email, cs.mphone, cs.job, cs.description, cs.contact_summary, cs.next_contact_time,cs.address,cs.birth from tbl_contacts cs join tbl_user u1 on cs.owner=u1.id left join tbl_dic_value dv1 on cs.source=dv1.id join tbl_customer co1 on cs.customer_id=co1.id left join tbl_dic_value dv2 on cs.appellation=dv2.id where cs.id=#{id}

select cs.id, u1.name as owner, dv1.value as source, cr1.name as customer_id, cs.fullname, dv2.value as appellation, cs.email, cs.mphone, cs.job, u2.name as create_by, cs.create_time, u3.name as edit_by, cs.edit_time, cs.description, cs.contact_summary, cs.next_contact_time, cs.address,cs.birth from tbl_contacts cs join tbl_user u1 on cs.owner=u1.id left join tbl_dic_value dv1 on cs.source=dv1.id left join tbl_customer cr1 on cs.customer_id=cr1.id left join tbl_dic_value dv2 on cs.appellation=dv2.id join tbl_user u2 on cs.create_by=u2.id left join tbl_user u3 on cs.edit_by=u3.id where cs.id=#{id}
select id,fullname,mphone,email from tbl_contacts where fullname like '%' #{fullname} '%'
